description.zh: 学习创建简单的分形图案，理解递归和自相似的概念在着色器中的应用。
description.en: Learn to create simple fractal patterns and understand the application of recursion and self-similarity concepts in shaders.

zh: 理解分形图案中自相似性的基本概念。
学习通过迭代或递归的方式在片元着色器中生成简单分形。
掌握坐标变换（如缩放、平移）在分形生成中的应用。
了解如何控制迭代次数以调整分形的复杂度和细节。
en: Understand the basic concept of self-similarity in fractal patterns.
Learn to generate simple fractals in a fragment shader through iteration or recursion.
Master the application of coordinate transformations (e.g., scaling, translation) in fractal generation.
Understand how to control the number of iterations to adjust the complexity and detail of fractals.
